#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int bin_search(int A[], int l, int r, int key) {
    int m;
 
    while( r - l > 1 ) {
        m = (l+r)/2;
        if(A[m]>key)
        r=m;
        else
        l=m;
    }
 
    return r;
}

int longest_subsequence(int a[], int num)
{
    int i;
    int len;
    int table[num+1];
    
    for(i=0;i<num;i++)
    table[i]=0;
    
    table[0]=a[0];
    len=1;
    for(i=1;i<num;i++)
    {
        if(a[i]<table[0])
        table[0]=a[i];
        else if(a[i]>=table[len-1])
        table[len++]=a[i];
        else
        table[bin_search(table,0,len-1,a[i])]=a[i];
    }
    
    return len;
    
}

int main()
{
    int num;
    cin>>num;
    int a[num+1],i;
    for(i=0;i<num;i++)
     {
     cin>>a[i];
     }
    cout<<longest_subsequence(a,num);
    return 0;
}
